title: Wilderness and Innocence by Dean Koontz (mobi)
description:
WILDERNESS (e-Short Story) by Dean Koontz

With this darkly intriguing original e-short story, #1 New York Times bestselling author Dean Koontz sets the stage for his masterly new novel of mystery, suspense, and strange wonderÃ¢â‚¬â€Innocence.

Ã¢â‚¬Å“The world is a machine that produces endless surprises and mysteries layered on mysteries.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½

Addison Goodheart is a mystery even to himself. He was born in an isolated home surrounded by a deep forest, never known to his father, kept secret from everyone but his mother, who barely accepts him. She is haunted by private demons and keeps many secretsÃ¢â‚¬â€none of which she dreads more than the young son who adores her.

Only in the woods, among the wildlife, is Addison truly welcome. Only there can he be at peace. Until the day he first knows terror, the day when his life changes radically and forever . . .





INNOCENCE: A NOVEL by Dean Koontz

He lives in solitude beneath the city, an exile from society, which will destroy him if he is ever seen.

She dwells in seclusion, a fugitive from enemies who will do her harm if she is ever found.

But the bond between them runs deeper than the tragedies that have scarred their lives. Something more than chanceÃ¢â‚¬â€and nothing less than destinyÃ¢â‚¬â€has brought them together in a world whose hour of reckoning is fast approaching.

In Innocence, #1 New York Times bestselling author Dean Koontz blends mystery, suspense, and acute insight into the human soul in a masterfully told tale that will resonate with readers forever.
